channel.title: Help please
channel.description: Ok so i followed the HD-Client guide and installed the titana cache where it is supposed to be.. but when i load the client the server picks it up as a valic connection but the client (which is HD) allways gets stuck at the checking for update screen, specifically at 12%, whats wrong? why cant i use my hd client?
